tour.navigation: Welcome to Adentro.ru - Argentina folk dances visualization project. You can choose a dance in the top menu.
tour.player: This is the player. Visualization starts automatically when the music reaches a particular point in time.
tour.music: You can choose an another music track. This may be helpful to understand better how the choreography is connected to music.
tour.schema: The scheme is also interactive. You can rewind the music by clicking on elements.
tour.animation: Visualization will be shown under the scheme. On an accented step the shapes will blink.
tour.animation_links: You can choose from different versions of choreography.
